content: double distaff is a pattern specifically for spindle spinners with the double distaff you will always have a place for your fiber while spinning so it get caught in your spindle anymore we´ve all been there the pattern is written in a way that allows you to use any yarn you have it´s perfect for using up handspun leftovers mini skeins or sample skeins you will need * 20 - 25 grams of yarn * a knitting needle a bit smaller than you would usually use for your yarn * 2 stitch holders * tapestry needle the size is to fit a wrist circumference up to 17 cm but there´s instructions on how to make it bigger in the pattern as well
